entry.title: How to watch the action comedy ‘Playdate,’ coming soon to Prime Video
entry.summary: Find out everything you need to know about the upcoming film starring Alan Ritchson, Kevin James, Sarah Chalke, and more.

entry.title: Amazon's water conservation and replenishment efforts around the world
entry.summary: Get the latest updates on how we’re reducing our water footprint and investing in innovations to address water scarcity.

entry.title: ‘Ballard’ renewed for Season 2 on Prime Video
entry.summary: Maggie Q will return as the titular Los Angeles Police Department detective Renée Ballard in the forthcoming season.

entry.title: How to watch 'Faceoff: Inside the NHL' on Prime Video
entry.summary: See unprecedented behind-the-scenes access with NHL stars like Sidney Crosby and the Tkachuk brothers in Season 2.

entry.title: How Prime members can get early tickets for 'Wicked: For Good’ only on Fandango
entry.summary: Prime members will be able to buy tickets to the early screening of ‘Wicked: For Good’ and see it four days before its theatrical release.

entry.title: Submit a Media Inquiry | Blue Origin
entry.summary: If you’re a member of the press, please contact us at media@blueorigin.com with your inquiry and deadline.

entry.title: Gallery | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Images available for download. Please credit Blue Origin.

entry.title: New Shepard’s Crewed NS-36 Mission Targets Liftoff on October 8 | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin announced its next New Shepard crewed flight, NS-36, will lift off from Launch Site One in West Texas on Wednesday, October 8.

entry.title: Blue Origin and Luxembourg Partner on Oasis-1 Mission to Map Lunar Resources | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin today announced Project Oasis, a multi-phase initiative to identify key lunar resources from orbit, assess them on the ground, and harness them in situ.

entry.title: Florida Investment Matches Our Ambitious Growth Plans | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin employs nearly 4,000 people in Brevard County and has invested over $2.3 billion with 500 suppliers in Florida, generating significant economic growth and employment in the region.

entry.title: Blue Origin Completes 35th New Shepard Mission | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin successfully completed its 35th New Shepard flight and 15th payload mission today from Launch Site One in West Texas.

entry.title: Entertainment
entry.summary: Stories about the latest apps and games, movies, TV shows, and music available from Amazon Prime Video, Amazon Music, and Kindle.

entry.title: Sustainability
entry.summary: Amazon puts our scale and inventive culture to work on sustainability and protecting the environment.

entry.title: Retail
entry.summary: More information about shopping on Amazon and our selection of products and services.

entry.title: Innovation at Amazon
entry.summary: Amazon is a company of builders. It's our job to make bold bets, and we get our energy from inventing on behalf of customers.

entry.title: Operations
entry.summary: Stories and information about the Amazon fulfillment network and our operations.

entry.title: Community
entry.summary: We look for uniquely Amazonian and innovative ways to make positive, lasting impacts and encourage our employees to champion causes they care about.
